WSUS32 KKCI 301255 
SIGC  
CONVECTIVE SIGMET 11C 
VALID UNTIL 1455Z 
TX 
FROM 60SE SAT-70NE LRD 
LINE EMBD TS 35 NM WIDE MOV FROM 24030KT. TOPS TO FL450. 
 
OUTLOOK VALID 301455-301855 
AREA 1...FROM 40W OKC-LIT-50NW MCB-40ENE ABI-40W OKC 
WST ISSUANCES EXPD. REFER TO MOST RECENT ACUS01 KWNS FROM STORM 
PREDICTION CENTER FOR SYNOPSIS AND METEOROLOGICAL DETAILS. 
 
AREA 2...FROM 40E SJT-LCH-40WSW SJI-50SSE LEV-110SE IAH-80E 
BRO-90W BRO-DLF-30WSW SJT-40E SJT 
WST ISSUANCES POSS. REFER TO MOST RECENT ACUS01 KWNS FROM STORM 
PREDICTION CENTER FOR SYNOPSIS AND METEOROLOGICAL DETAILS.
==
